text: "Will You Be There" is a song by American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson from his 1991 album Dangerous. The song, which also serves as the official soundtrack theme for the 1993 movie Free Willy, touches on themes of love, support, and the desire for companionship, expressing a longing for reassurance from a loved one. Its emotional lyrics and Jackson's powerful vocal delivery make it a memorable track. == Music video == The music video features clips from Free Willy, including clips from Jackson performing the song during the 1992-1993 Dangerous World Tour.
title: Will You Be There
